Name: D-glucose transport via ABC system
Equation: atp_c + glc__D_e + h2o_c --> adp_c + glc__D_c + h_c + pi_c

Name: D-glucose transport via ABC system (periplasm)
Equation: atp_c + glc__D_p + h2o_c --> adp_c + glc__D_c + h_c + pi_c

Name: D-glucose reversible transport via proton symport (periplasm)
Glucose transport via diffusion (extracellular to periplasm)
